text: @mattgaetz These people are the reason we're a laughing stock #Idiocracy to the world. We're about to be banned from traveling to the EU due to our horrible response to COVID19. I'd keep the gates shut forever if I were them. This is utter stupidity. Look AT THESE RICH WHITE IDIOTS!
